I wrote all your requests down. I'm still having sync problems with the games i've recorded, evidently the fix I applied for beta2 encodes refuses to work now, i'm looking for other ways to guarantee audio sync.
Thank you.  Went to bed thinking the Falcons going to loose.  So I am downloading this to watch.  Thanks phatwarez!
Thanks for the effort! I don't even care if the audio is out of sync =)

The Audio out of sync wasn't a problem for me last week, played in VLC.
Dunno if it's the same problem now, but saw some comments on that last week.

I don't care if some seconds off if that's the problem.
these are great games but do u have the Chiefs vs Lions game, that would be greatly appeciated if u could put it up.

Please create Week2 Browns @ Colts .... 

Week 1 was great ...

Thanks so much in advance!

Great job on uploading games man. I've been following you since last year. 

Personally, I mostly follow the games of Miami Dolphins, Carolina Panthers and New England Patriots and since they don't show NFL matches in the country where I live in, I would really appreciate it if you could try to upload some of their matches ^^.

I will seed any Patriots games you upload. Thank you for this and keep up the great work!

I played Week 1 Patriots at Dolphins in VLC Media Player and everything worked perfectly.

Your uploads are awesome....i would absolutely love the Lions vs Chiefs game. I saw it was already requested. Once that's up I will definitely seed all the Lions games you post. Thanks again! It is much appreciated for us "displaced fans"!

This and your week 1 Dolphins torrent were my first ever sports torrents. Fantastic quality, good job. Again, VLC player played both files perfectly, if that's of any use to you.

I'm a Dolphins fan who can't access any of their games, so another polite request for Dolphins games, please! :)

Top torrenting!
Thanks as always. I agree with the comment above about the audio. It is not a big deal being out of sync, especially with VLC. Just want to watch the games. Steelers' game as always. Thanks again.
Any chance you'll be uploading the Bills/Raiders game?

We are all hitting refresh search "nfl" on TPB 300 times every day waiting for our games.
We all want them, and know that Phatwarez will deliver :)

If he wants the torrents perfect, I understand.
He is a BEAST when it comes to NFL torrents, and has a good rep. 
Why put out torrents that has some audio quality when it can be fixed? I understand !

We know the games will come soon, and they will all be perfect!
Just gotta wait a bit, and try to avoid spoilers from the games xD

I

Thanks for all your interest. I'm re-installing Windows for the third time now due to another dead hard disk so there is gonna be an extended delay.

Again if anyone has any TYT logins I can repost some games in the meantime while I work on this.

Hi phatwarez

Firstly, well done for persevering. It must be very frustrating. You've got more patience than me.

Secondly, I personally think the sync issues should be sorted out before uploading, especially if the sound comes before the pictures.    

Unfortunately I doubt if you'll get any TYT logins here. Most of us have either had our TYT accounts disabled or can't sign up. That's why we're looking here.

Good luck!
Also, as Nik09 said, please avoid any spoilers, even comments that may not be but could be construed as such, like chong67 above. Thanks.

take your time, phat. we all understand if you're having computer problems.  

we can all wait for the high quality work you offer.
Any other week 2 torrents coming? Hoping for the Broncos Bengals game
Sorry for my comment Phat.  I hadn't read all the other comments first.  Good luck with your technical issues.  And THANKS for posting football games.  Our family REALLY appreciates it.
Thank you a lot phatwarez for all the NFL posts! Good luck with your computer problems.

I'm waiting for new hardware to arrive. Once I have a working PC i'll be able to continue work. 
#Crosses Fingers
Is there still hope to get week 2 games when you get your new rig, or are those lost?
thanks for all the effort! i don't care when it goes up, so long as you can get em uploaded. i'd love to see the cards v. skins game if you've got it

Hi phatwarez.

Hope you're able to fix your various problems.

Personally I think week 3 games should now be the priority. Texans@Saints, Giants@Eagles and Packers@Bears look great match ups and would really be appreciated.
Jets@Raiders and Falcons@Bucs look good match ups too, but obviously this looks like a very lengthy interruption.
I like to thank you for games you are putting on and hope your computor is up soon so we can get games we miss
Thanks again phatwarez. I look forward to the rest of week 2 and week 3 games. I really enjoyed Week 3, and the Match ups for week 4 looks really good.

Hi Phatwarez,

I really appreciate you getting these games up, i live outside the states and this is the one feasible way of me seeing these games and following my team.  You make my life better.

Cheers for making the effort to put these up, hope you're back in action soon. Looking forward to seeing the week 3 packers@bears game ;]

God speed sir!
Just like j4z278, I live outside the USA now and this is the only realistic way to watch the NFL and my teams.
